Resume and Work of Jeffrey H.S. Knaack

Statement

I am a technologist, developer, educator and leader who wants to build things that real people can use. As a dedicated public servant, I have spent the last 15 years improving the experiences of users interacting with government websites and services. I want to continue creating accessible, performant, and useful digital tools for public use.

Project Contributions

The Official Website of the State of New York - ny.gov

Twig templating, svelte component development, sass, general css and html, presentational javascript, various drupalings Link to the NY.gov website

The Official Website of the Governor of the State of New York - governor.ny.gov

yes Link to the Governor.ny.gov website

I'm building this site in the open and never have much time, so stuff is constantly broken and incomplete.
